fields.summary: LiveView: 'liveview server stop' has to be executed in order to successfully run liveview on another platform

comments.body: Verified on Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.2.201308091728 (containing LiveView 0.1.32), OSX 10.8.3 that launching different projects with LiveView on iOS simulator worked successfully without a need for explicitly stopping the server. Closing.
